meanings: (무섭거나 화가 나서) shake, tremble, quiver, shiver, shudder, quake

meanings.meaning: freeze a person with a frown

vlive.korean: [효연이를 공포에 떨게 했던 그 날 밤의 사건] 바람 소리인가? [The incident that scared Hyoyeon that night] Is it wind? 듣기 View video 소녀포레스트 - SM CCC LAB : [소녀포레스트ㅣGIRLS FOR REST] Preview03. 소녀포레스트 숙소에 누군가 있다?!
vlive.english: [The incident that scared Hyoyeon that night] Is it wind?

vlive.korean: 근데 이게 별거 아닌데 떨게 되더라고요 그렇죠? It's not that big of a deal but you still get really nervous. Right? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.134 2019 설특집 아육대 part.1
vlive.english: It's not that big of a deal but you still get really nervous. Right?

vlive.korean: 더 떨게 되는것 같다. I get scared. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [6-1] 추억의 일기장 속, 단원들이 찾은 대본 힌트는?
[극한 공포에 떨게 됩니다] 무서워. [She's scared] I am scared. 듣기 View video Apink : [Apink] 익스트림 어드벤처 1화
[게임 대장도 떨게 만드는 상어 녀석] 이거 너무 무섭다. This is such a scary game. 듣기 View video 소소전파사 (SOxSO MEDIA) : 부메랑 Ep4. 에이프릴 데이트 트랙 쟁탈전 part 2
vlive.english: This is such a scary game.

examples.korean: drug dealers terrorizing the neighbourhood 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인근 사람들을 공포에 떨게 하는 마약상들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: drug dealers terrorizing the neighbourhood Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do. (Eleanor Roosevelt) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 멈춰서 두려움에 떨게 만드는 모든 경험을 통해 강인함, 용기, 자신감을 얻는다. '이런 공포를 이겨냈으니 다음에 오는 것도 문제 없어'라고 스스로 되뇌일 수 있게 된다. 따라서 할 수 없다고 생각되는 일을 하라. (엘리노어 루즈벨트, 경험명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do. (Eleanor Roosevelt) Add to Wordbook
